Class BistOuchTranslatorUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.server.adapter.bist.ouch.message.BistOuchTranslatorUtil

extends Object

      • getAndValidateClOrdId

        public static BytesSegment getAndValidateClOrdId(IFIXMessage message,
                                                 int length)
                                          throws TranslatorException
        Validate presence and length of ClOrdID in FIX message
        Parameters:
        message - FIX message
        length - length
        Returns:
        clOrdId ClOrdID
        Throws:
        TranslatorException - no ClOrdID or invalid length

      • validateAndTranslateOpenClose

        public static byte validateAndTranslateOpenClose(BytesSegment openClose)
                                          throws TranslatorException
        Check that supplied in FIX OpenClose field is supported by OUCH market and translate it to corresponding OUCH value.

        If null or empty BytesSegment the DEFAULT OpenClose will be returned.

        Parameters:
        openClose - - FIX PositionEffect field
        Returns:
        ASX OUCH TimeInForce value
        Throws:
        TranslatorException - if not supported TimeInForce or length of FIX TimeInForce field more then 1 byte

      • validateAndTranslateTimeInForce

        public static byte validateAndTranslateTimeInForce(BytesSegment timeInForce)
                                            throws TranslatorException
        Check that supplied in FIX TimeInForce field is supported by OUCH market and translate it to corresponding OUCH value.

        If null or empty BytesSegment the DAY TimeInForce will be returned.

        Parameters:
        timeInForce - - FIX TimeInForce
        Returns:
        ASX OUCH TimeInForce value
        Throws:
        TranslatorException - if not supported TimeInForce or length of FIX TimeInForce field more then 1 byte

      • translateQuantity

        public static long translateQuantity(BytesSegment quantity)
                              throws TranslatorException
        Translate FIX ASCII field which holds order quantity to integer

        Note: Although we are not doing any unsigned arithmetic here and the return type is long, since there is no division involved, the underlying byte structure of long will be same as if unsigned arithmetic was performed. The maximum allowed unsigned long value will presented by java as -1.

        Parameters:
        quantity - - ASCII coded order quantity
        Returns:
        quantity of order as integer
        Throws:
        TranslatorException - - if after decimal point there is any digits other then zero

      • parseMatchId

        public static String parseMatchId(BytesSegment matchIdSegment)
                           throws TranslatorException
        Borsa Istanbul Match ID is 12 bytes long which is a numeric value.
        Parameters:
        matchIdSegment - BytesSegment holding the MatchID bytes.
        Returns:
        Converted MatchID as string.
        Throws:
        TranslatorException - TBD
